wallet.createimport.desc: Restore your existing account or enroll a new one
auth.wallet.register.desc: This account is pending activation. Click activate to begin the process
auth.wallet.registration.type.email.desc: Go through the know your customer (KYC) procedure to activate your account. To do so, please send your public key to {mail} and proceed with the instructions that you will receive in response
auth.error.E_INVALID_KEY: Provided key is corrupted or contains invalid data
auth.error.E_DELETEDKEY: Accounts was removed from the ecosystem
auth.error.E_OFFLINE: Could not connect to the service
auth.error.E_UPDATING: Node is updating blockchain. Try again later
auth.backup.invalid: Provided key is corrupted or contains invalid data
auth.havekey.desc: Access your IBAX account with a backup of your private key, through the process of restoring your account data.
auth.import.disclaimer: Please enter your account backup payload to restore access to the system
auth.login.guest.desc: Proceed with this option if you want to try IBAX in test mode
auth.nokey: I don't have a private key
auth.nokey.desc: Restore your account here with your seed or create a new one and protect it with a password.
auth.password.changed: Password changed. Please login with new password
auth.qrcode.desc: Use this code to import the account on your mobile device
auth.remove.desc: Do you really want to delete this account? THIS ACTION IS IRREVERSIBLE
auth.remember.disclaimer: Please make sure that you keep your passphrase (account seed) safe and remember the password. You will be asked to retype them for confirmation
auth.remember.disclaimer.confirm: Please repeat your registration values. This step is required to ensure that your passphrase and password are stored correctly
auth.role.disclaimer: Select role that you want to use to login. Data representation will change according to the selected role. You can switch between roles at any time
auth.backup.warn: Warning:  weaver.ibax.io never stores your password/private key/seed, so it is not possible to recover or reset it for you. If you forget your password, only your private key or seed (mnemonic phrase) can help you restore your access to the funds in your wallet.
auth.session.prompt: Please enter your password to sign in
auth.welcome.continue: Press 'Create or import account' button to begin the process of creating or restoring your account
auth.welcome.guide: Before proceeding, you will be guided through the account creation process. This will not take too much time. After completing this process you will be able to use all features of IBAX
editor.close.confirm: Do you really want to close '{name}' without saving changes?
editor.close.all.confirm: Do you really want to close all tabs without saving?
editor.page.name: Name
editor.revert.confirm: Do you really want to discard all changes in '{name}'?
general.error.notfound: The page you are looking for does not exist
general.error.page: The page you are looking for could not be processed
general.error.timeout: The page you are looking for is too heavy to be processed. Consider reducing number of database queries
general.error.socket.desc: Failed to establish connection to the WebSocket server. Check your configuration
general.network.add.desc: Specify connection details and connect to another network not listed there
general.network.add.help: Enter network parameters. If connection succeeds it will be added to the list of configured networks
general.network.notconnected.desc: Please connect to a network to begin using IBAX. You can manage networks by clicking on the connection indicator in the top right corner of this window
general.network.name: Name
general.notfound.page.notexists: The page you are looking for does not exist
general.title: IBAX
general.security.warning: Please use desktop version for better security
install.database.name: DB name
legal.about: Weaver - a software product developed by IBAX. It works with blockchain networks that are built to use IBAX Protocol
modal.authorization.title: Authorization
modal.authorization.password: Please enter your password to perform this action
modal.confirm.title: Confirmation
modal.imageeditor.desc: Prepare your image for uploading by selecting which part of the image you want to use
modal.imageeditor.title: Image editor
modal.locale.title: Switch language
modal.network.remove.confirmation: Do you really want to delete network "{name}"?
privileged.desc: You will not be prompted to enter your password when performing actions that require authorization
tx.error.E_GUEST_VIOLATION.desc: Transaction can't be executed using demo mode
tx.error.E_LIMITFORSIGN.desc: Transaction params are too heavy to execute
tx.error.E_OFFLINE.desc: Failed to connect to the server
validation.email: Value must be a valid e-mail
validation.url: Value must be a valid URL
